name: palecur
text: Beef's nervous bladder doesn't get enough strips.

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by The_Prophet, fakead, mikeronomicon, hastooo, Jesler729, lordatog, purplehaze, indiglow, wurlitzergirl, LordHumungus, songbirdspectre, mega_panda, catgrl131, Koremora, ActualTaunt, waldo913, differentdog, Carrot, luckypyjamas, twohats, ravindra108, Hyetal, kenyot, anitrophaeron, swatson, Mastronaut, tellumo)

name: saint
text: wow. 12 lames just goes to show you what happens when you dare talk back to Onstad.

name: molesticide
text: A comment left by molesticide was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, Tony, RedMange, TheGreatestCape)

name: philosophe
text: Why is this lamed? This is an intelligent, correct comment.

name: salo
text: I had to chubby it just because of that lame. That's not how things should be, and yet they are!

name: relaxing
text: A comment left by relaxing was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, jaredwilde, mikeronomicon, farqussus, ActualTaunt, IggyMoonbeam, HolyQ, lux, thegrayhoodie, idsyen, ravindra108, gardenhead_, cailetshadow, clintisiceman)

text: A comment left by lux was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shades, ASaltySalute4, OnePaperTiger)

name: relaxing
text: A comment left by relaxing was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, mikeronomicon, lordatog, ActualTaunt, IggyMoonbeam, deliciousmuffin, cuttlefish)

name: onepapertiger
text:
OOO-RAH.
Normally I'm more reserved in my approach to this topic, but you pulled out more balls in your comments than those machines at bowling alleys and for that sir, I give you a well-deserved chubby.

name: jhunter
text: relaxing is doing just the opposite, he is busting out some serious sass and for that i want to touch his face maybe just a little bit.

name: thegrayhoodie
text: Yeah dog, they all needs to get they headpiece checked.  Aww shit I done dropped some gerunds.

name: snowman
text: I agree with this, and I've heard a lot of "good" rap that people have played for me (always with the assurance that this is "underground" rap) but rap, even in what I am told is its best form, just doesn't tend to do anything for me.

name: deimosrising
text: chubby means you said something positive, lame means you said something negative. most people don't give a shit if you're right, funny, relevant, or anything else that actually matters. i accept that i'm going to get lamed anytime i say something even as mild as "this strip just doesn't do it for me" and chubbied for something (equally meaningless) like "what a funny strip lol"

name: saucy_jack
text: Somebody a few strips back got lamed pretty hard for using "lol."

name: saint
text: beef can't take a good piss without someone screwin it up. "dude i was on the moon and still couldn't take a decent piss man."

name: cicadalek
text: Note the male sign next to the toilet door in the single-manned rocket. I have to wonder if there was also a female one just to show how 'open minded' Pat is.

name: honesttom
text: And one for wheelchair users.

name: zeal
text: It is a relic of Pat's past, from the days before the family curse took hold.  In those days he still dreamed of taking a fine lady up to the moon and christening it for all cat-kind.  He kept it in the design as yet another cover for his new feelings once the curse took hold.

name: epicurus
text: I have an alternate theory: Pat only installed one bathroom, the men's room, and decided on impulse to put up the "male" sign. He didn't know why at the time, but it comforted him.

name: aperson
text: Bad me for being confused by the "PSSSS" and assuming masturbation.

name: cheeks_jd
text: PSSSSSS is a sound associated with masturbation in your book?

name: spinynorman
text: I suppose it could be the sigh made having spent your wad into a fistful of toilet paper or whatever.

name: relaxing
text: shit man.

name: evolume
text: it still says "Java" and it will so forever...

name: ashoykh
text: I imagine I'm on a lifeboat in the middle of the Pacific.

name: ashoykh
text: Also, I don't think he's imagining being ON a rocket ship.  He imagines that he IS a rocket ship.

name: closefriend
text: Why piss in the toilet when there's the word "JAVA" only a few feet away?

name: blastradius
text: because you can't piss outside on the moon ... the vaccuum of space and all that. do you want beef to lose his trolley? do you? huh?

name: al_batross
text: De-Yamming yourself in space would truly suck.

name: laserblade
text: Yeah, but there's still gravity.  It would fall in a perfect arc onto the lunar dust and seep in.

name: relaxing
text:
i imagine the piss sort of beading up into droplets on the lunar surface, like drops of water on powdered cornstarch


(chubby to the o.p. for the diss on java)

name: laserblade
text: Oh dang now we have to test this.  To the moon!

name: agentstinky
text: Ohhh shit he's peeing!  For like 20 past reads of this strip I thought he was...um...fapping, as the popular saying goes.

name: charchar
text: Space toilets are really just vacuums for your goodies.

name: tekende
text:
Hungry Gus...

IN SPAAAAAAAAACEEEE!

name: snowman
text: alt-text pushed this one to a 5 for me.

name: l33tfuzzbox
text: I feel Beef's pain.  Not a week passes without someone knocking on the bathroom at work, at which time my gasket locks up.

name: wallabeechamp
text: Rap *is* good music! But yes, I like Bob Dylan as well!

name: genequagmire
text: I like good music better than pretty much everything.

name: hobit
text: i rate this a five based on alt text alone
